text:
Change event ID N_SIAM.3 in r56_SIA_events.txt into an event which is trigger on 7 November 1937 annoucing the reelection of Phraya Phahon giving political power and shifting the Balance of Power slighty to the right. This is the localization text of the event: TITLE: Phraya Phahon Reelected

TEXT: The results of the 1937 Siamese general election are in. Unlike the previous election in 1933, which was indirect, this yearâ€™s election was directly decided by the people. Voter turnout was around 40% of eligible voters.

Despite earlier plans to resign, Phraya Phahon has continued his tenure as prime minister.

I have created the event `N_SIAM.3` in the file `events/r56_SIA_events.txt` (creating the file as it did not exist) and added the corresponding localization.

**Changes:**
1.  **Created `events/r56_SIA_events.txt`:**
    *   Defined namespace `N_SIAM`.
    *   Added event `N_SIAM.3` triggered on 7 November 1937.
    *   Added effects: +50 Political Power, +0.05 shift to `SIA_RH_KHANA` (Right/Khana Ratsadon side) in the Balance of Power.

2.  **Updated `localisation/english/mod_localisations_l_english.yml`:**
    *   Added title `N_SIAM.3.t`: "Phraya Phahon Reelected".
    *   Added description `N_SIAM.3.d`: "The results of the 1937 Siamese general election are in..."
    *   Added option `N_SIAM.3.a`: "A new mandate."

**File Content: `events/r56_SIA_events.txt`**
```hoi4
add_namespace = N_SIAM

country_event = {
	id = N_SIAM.3
	title = N_SIAM.3.t
	desc = N_SIAM.3.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write
	
	trigger = {
		tag = SIA
		date > 1937.11.6
		date < 1937.11.8
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}
	
    fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = N_SIAM.3.a
		add_political_power = 50
		add_power_balance_value = {
			id = SIA_Rep_House_BOP
			value = 0.05
            side = SIA_RH_KHANA
		}
	}
}
```
